original_title: Analyst inquiry pending on Russian woman death
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News1st): The Government Analyst is to conduct a site examination at the logding used by the Russian woman who was recently found dead in the Kolapu Oya in Hikkaduwa.
The cause of the deat is yet to be determine, Sri Lanka Police said.
Her remains are placed at the morgue of the Karapitiya Hospital in Galle, and the post morterm examination cannot be conducted until a relative arrives, Police added.
The nude body of the Russian woman was found floating in the Kolapu Oya close to the hotel she was staying at.
Anti-Terrorism Act, that is to replace the PTA, is an even more serious threat to democracy
